title: Mathieu van der Poel Is Making ‘Cross Look like PlayStation – Can He Continue to Crush until Worlds?
content:
'He's a level too high': MVDP deploys inch-perfect power-up to pummel Pidcock and Iserbyt in Diegem and continue unbeaten streak.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel Is Making ‘Cross Look like PlayStation – Can He Continue to Crush until Worlds? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
